name: Super Spray n' Slay 3D
description:
Made for the

DOS Games Jam

out 3/26/20

Super Spray n' Slay 3D is a surreal and nonsensical dungeon crawler with light gun game play.

Spend a normal day as maid Anastasia Wellington Claymore III as she makes sure the hotel is clean and presentable.

Includes:

- 6 Thrilling levels

- 5 nasty types of germs

-Exciting spray bottle action

-Consumerism

-Old English dialogue

-A plot line

-A new fresh scent

Controls:

Move forward using w or up arrow. Rotate using a,d, left and right arrows. Show those germs what for with the left and right mouse buttons.

made by

Allen https://twitter.com/Allen101110

Erik https://twitter.com/ErikSheader
